proposal: #44 - Treasury proposal for New Product Development & OpenGov Deployment
rationale: This proposal aims to cover infrastructure costs for Polkassembly and their governance features implementation.
details: Polkassembly is an integral part of Polkadot and Kusama governance. The features such as delegation, user-friendly interfaces, and improved governance experiences, so that's why support them with our AYE.

proposal: #229 - Subscan | Infrastructure Costs of Subscan for Kusama & Statemine (from July to December 2022)
rationale: This referendum aims to fix previous referendum #214 and further decentralize collator set on Kusama system chains.
details: Subscan is importnant part of Polkadot ecosystem and having Kusama & Statemine on Subscan is absolutely essential.

proposal: #103 [MBIP-5] Possible Solutions for Unsustainable Storage Growth - MBIP-5: Add a Storage limit per gas
rationale: This proposal aims to add a storage limit per gas.
details: There is no change to the base fee (when compared to MBIP-4). The transaction fee calculation follows the EIP-1559 standard, as this MBIP is focused on gas limit.

rationale: This proposal is to Register xcNODL as an XC-20 and open HRMP channel with Nodle Network.
details: Adding more parachain native tokens such as NODL from Nodle Network into Moonbeam as XC-20 tokens improve the multichain spirit of Polkadot.

rationale: By that referendum approved, 2,22M ASTR will be added to the Omnipool with 5% weight cap.
details: Adding new Polkadot native assets such as GLMR or ASTR is super important for the HydraDX Omnipool adoption, so that's we supported this referendum.

proposal: #35 - CP53(GI): Listing CFG in HydraDX Omnipool & seeding initial liquidity
rationale: This referendum will enable listing EFG token in HydraDX Omnipool and seeding the initial liquidity.
details: Adding new Polkadot native assets such as CFG is super important for the HydraDX Omnipool liquidity and further adoption, so that's we supported this referendum.
